name: Melody Muncher
description:
Melody Muncher v2.03

Soundtrack download

Melody Muncher was originally made in 48 hours for round 33 of Ludum Dare. The theme was "You are the Monster", so I made a fun rhythm game where you control Ms. Melody, a piranha plant that chomps good guys who run in from the sides of the screen. Very similar to Ripple Runner!

Awards (out of 1199 compo entries):

  • #1 in Audio
  • #6 in Overall

Ludum Dare submission page

Original compo version submitted to Ludum Dare
